Plot: A rebellious girl is sent to a Southern beach town for the summer to stay with her father. Through their mutual love of music, the estranged duo learn to reconnect.
Title: The Last Song
Writer: Nicholas Sparks (screenplay), Jeff Van Wie (screenplay), Nicholas Sparks (book)
Actors: Miley Cyrus, Greg Kinnear, Bobby Coleman, Liam Hemsworth
tomatoConsensus: As shamelessly manipulative as any Nicholas Sparks production, The Last Song is done no favors by its miscast and overmatched star, Miley Cyrus.
